entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 12:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 25 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
